description: Used to visualise metrics collected from the mikenye/readsb-protobuf docker image.

targets.query: SELECT last("Lat") FROM "aircraft" WHERE ("host" = 'readsb' AND "Icao" != '') AND time >= now() - 1m GROUP BY "Icao"

options.content: Map" style="width:100%; height:100%; padding:0; margin:0; border:none;"></iframe>

targets.query: SELECT mean("local_signal") AS "signal", mean("local_noise") AS "noise" FROM "readsb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT sum("local_accepted") AS "local_accepted", sum("local_strong_signals") AS "local_strong_signals" FROM "readsb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("tracks_with_position") FROM "readsb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("tracks_with_position") FROM "readsb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("cpu")  / 1000 FROM "exec_rtlsdr_temp" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(previous)

SELECT last("Lat"), "Long", "Alt", "Cmsgs", "GAlt", "InHg", "PosTime", "Sig", "Spd", "TAlt", "TTrk", "Trak", "Trt", "Vsi" FROM "aircraft" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "Icao", "Call"
SELECT mean("local_signal") AS "signal", mean("local_noise") AS "noise" FROM "readsb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("local_signal") AS "signal", mean("local_noise") AS "noise" FROM "readsb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT sum("local_accepted") AS "local_accepted", sum("local_strong_signals") AS "local_strong_signals" FROM "readsb" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

list.label: Hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query: show tag values from "readsb" with key = "host"

title: ADS-B
